1. Check the sequencing quality of RNA-seq data using 'qualityScores' function in Rsub
Read to assign reads to genes.
4. Use 'voom' function in limma package to
Read counts and to estimate the mean-variance relationship.
6. Use 'treat' \(or 'eBayes') function in limma to compute moderated t statistic for each gene for each comparison.
Call differentially expressed genes using the 'decideTests' function in limma.
Read package can be downloaded from http://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/Rsubread.html.
The limma package can be downloaded from http://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/limma.html
